title: Splash Elements
longDescription:
Enjoy the dynamic and action animation template, which includes a unique collection of energy elements! This package contains 12 Splash sprite sheet animations for 2D Games.

         

Features:

● Sprite animations work much better than any other shaders and particles due to

memory capacity.

● Optimized for games.

● Pivot point set properly.

● No setup or plug-ins required.

● All materials, sprites and other parts of pack properly named.
technicalDetails:
Video:

https://youtu.be/xgsBigYh6j0


Technical details:

● File Formats: transparent Png.

● Each frame dimension is 512*288 px.

● 60 FPS


Texture Resolutions:


● Splash 01_#[512,288].png 2048x1481

● Splash 02_#[512,288].png 2048x1440

● Splash 03_#[512,288].png 2048x1481

● Splash 04_#[512,288].png 2048x1536

● Splash 05_#[512,288].png 2048x1440

● Splash 06_#[512,288].png 2048x1481

● Splash 07_#[512,288].png 4096x2304

● Splash 08_#[512,288].png 2048x1440

● Splash 09_#[512,288].png 2048x1613

● Splash 10_#[512,288].png 4608x2880

● Splash 11_#[512,288].png 2048x1317

● Splash 12_#[512,288].png 2048x1536


Number of Textures: 12

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)
